name: ch-charcuterie-boards
title: CH Charcuterie Boards
description: Natural edge hickory charcuterie boards, engraved with the logo of the CH Distillery. They requested these boards for use at their larger events. Both sides are engraved, so the boards can be flipped to provide smaller or larger surface area depending on the amount of food to be placed on them. They loved them so much that they had us make eight smaller boards for use in their restaurant day to day. All boards were taken from the same plank of hickory to create a beautiful set.
teaser: Natural edge hickory charcuterie boards, engraved with the logo of the CH Distillery

name: oak-buffet
title: Oak Buffet
description: A beautiful buffet made primarily with quartersawn white oak. Both cabinets have an adjustable shelf, and all drawers have soft close glides.
teaser: Beautiful quartersawn white oak buffet with plenty of storage

name: snowflake-ornament-set
title: Snowflake Ornament Set
description: A set of snowflake ornaments cut out of 1/8th inch aspen. This set used six of the available designs. Most of them were designed by Isaiah, with a couple designed by his siblings. Each is about three and a half inches in diameter and has a ribbon for hanging. You or your kids can cut out snowflakes and send them in to have them made into wooden snowflakes to get a personalized one of a kind set!
teaser: Unique snowflake ornaments cut out of aspen

name: personalized-box
title: Personalized Box
description: This beautiful box has amrbosia maple sides capped with walnut to form a double box joint. Accented with sapele for the base and lid. Engraved with an initial to personalize the box.
teaser: Exotic woods, artistic joints, personalized engraving; what's not to love?

name: simple-toddler-bench
title: Simple Toddler Bench
description: A simple pine bench set at a low height for small toddlers. Shown at ten inches, when flipped the seat is at twelve inches. The shelf for toy storage was made to fit baskets the family had previously purchased.
teaser: Simple, reversible bench for toddlers and toy storage

name: award-goldies
title: Goldies Award Cutouts
description: A set of identical cutouts intended for use in a fun awards ceremony between coworkers. Made from 1/8th inch hardboard, they're ready to paint and be presented!
teaser: Set of identical fish cutouts for the Goldies award ceremony

name: customized-frames
title: Customized Frames
description: These frames were made as a pair, using maple and red oak in opposite positions. Engraved with the names of the people that would be displayed in them. The frames were also equipped with special hardware that allows the picture to be easily changed.
teaser: Two tone paired picture frames, personalized with the names of the people to be displayed in them

name: eqk-cutting-board
title: Natural Edge Walnut Cutting Board
description: A simple and elegant natural edge walnut cutting board with a personalized engraving.
teaser: Simple, elegant natural edge walnut cutting board

name: maybon-bench
title: Outdoor Bench
description: Durable and simple walnut bench, coated with marine varnish to survive any outdoor weather.

name: rjm-box
title: Box with Monogram
description: Cedar and poplar box, engraved with a custom designed monogram.
teaser: Cedar and poplar box with monogram

name: grey-bathroom-set
title: Grey Bathroom Set
description: Grey-washed poplar, made to match the the accents already in the bathroom.

name: white-oak-bathroom-set
title: Quartersawn White Oak Bathroom Set
description: Quartersawn white oak bathroom set is Mission style inspired. It's open shelf design and slatted sides help keep the weight of the vanity down.

name: 4-4-14-cutting-serving-board
title: Natural Edge Cherry Cutting/Serving Board
description: A simple and elegant natural edge cherry cutting and serving board engraved with the anniversary of the recipients.
teaser: Simple, elegant natural edge cherry cutting/serving board

name: ash-cabinet
title: Ash Cabinet
description: A simple ash cabinet for storage, set at window height for placing planters for herbs. Adjustable shelves in the cabinet make this a versatile and beautiful piece. The door hinges are soft close, so won't accidentally bang them shut.
teaser: Simple ash cabinet for storage and growing herbs

name: doorhanger-name
title: Personalized Name Door Hanger
description: A door hanger of the name of the people's home. A fun way to let your guests know they're in the right place.
teaser: Door hanger bearing the name of the residents
